title: Voice typing is slow, stops before I'm done. Live Caption is OFF.
content:
Voice typing is very laggy on my Pixel 5. Sometimes it stops altogether, and only types the first word and then ignores everything else I say.
It is a similar issue to this thread: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/18009311?hl=en but none of those solutions help.
Live Caption is turned off
I have never installed Swift Key
The problem persists whether I'm on wifi or not

Previously I used voice typing on my Pixel XL2 all the time and it worked great. Thanks for any help.
